title: Thundu
short_cast: Biju Menon, Shine Tom Chacko, Gokulan, Nitin Thomas, Unnimaya Prasad, Shaju Sreedhar, Johny Antony, Vineeth Thattil David

desc: After chiding his son for cheating on school exams, a bungling cop stoops to similarly devious tactics to pass a test that could grant him a promotion.
